channel.title: Fast and Furious 7
channel.description:
Oh my god! Fast and Furious 7... Has anyone recently been to watch it? Not going to spoil anything xD. I really recommend people who've never watched a Fast and Furious movie to go ahead and watch this one! You'll absolutely love it. I'll leave a trailer down below for those who've not watched FaF 7 yet, to get a rough idea of what it's about :D [center]RIP Paul[/center]
[center]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Skpu5HaVkOc[/center]

item.title: Fast and Furious 7
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I personally thought it was a breathe of fresh air from the producers and such. I loved the media, it had a bit of action along with a nice mix of emotion (blended it a tad bit better than how they usually did it). Not to mention the way they had did the memorial for Paul - loved it.

Read full topic

item.title: Fast and Furious 7
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

should’ve stopped after the second one.

Read full topic

item.title: Fast and Furious 7
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

normally after a FaF movie, it would be followed by a solid hoon sesh, we found ourselves going for a long cruise through a forest environment in memorial of Paul.

Another group (I wish I attended the event) went to the drive-ins, and after the tribute to paul, they all revved their engines in memorial <3.

Read full topic

item.title: Fast and Furious 7
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

Some people are never amused by anything, i thought this was an amazing movie. Who the fudge cares if it’s “unrealistic” it’s fast and furious what did they expect?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I can’t wait to watch it not to mention how they’ve departed Paul Walker from the film based on the brief reviews I’ve read.

item.title: Fast and Furious 7
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Lil_Smok3r:

I really recommend people who’ve never watched a Fast and Furious movie to go ahead and watch this one!

You really need to watch all of them to understand a lot of what is going on in this one. I liked it, but some things were over the top and felt like I was in a Michael Bay film.

Read full topic
